Tan Siak Lim, CFP. Director, Financial Advisory Group at Financial AllianceLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 30 Aug 2018Yes, they will inherit. If you don't have a Will (I guess you don't), it will be inherited based on intestate succession act, https://sso.agc.gov.sg/Act/ISA1967. If you don't like the way it works, just write a will so that your flat can be given according to your wish.0 comments0
